title: After Byzantium - The Survival of Byzantine Sacred Art
description:
Meta to Vyzantio: the Survival of Byzantine Sacred Art

The Private Bank & Trust Company | ISBN: 9608577608 | 320 pages | PDF | 1996 | English | 49 Mb

"The Works of Art in This book do not claim to represent comprehensive range of the religious Art of Byzantium. Rather they are selection and are made on personal basis. My Purpose has been to put together as many of the best specimens as could found outside national collections. I have paid particular attention to icons from Crete and from northern Greece.

Marianna Latsis
